author: Special Correspondent
text:
A three-year-old female Sambar deer that strayed into the residential area from the Western Ghats was crushed to death by a speeding vehicle near Nanguneri on Thursday night.

The deer which was seen grazing along the banks of the Nambiyar for the last few days was fatally knocked down by the vehicle when it attempted to cross the Tirunelveli-Nagercoil four-lane near the Nanguneri toll plaza.

On seeing the carcass lying on the road, the toll plaza workers informed the forest personnel about the mishap.

Forest personnel from Kalakkad retrieved the carcass and sent it for autopsy by a veterinarian.
title: Sambar deer crushed to death
